title: Salinas Pueblo Missions National Monument: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       Operating Hours & Seasons  The Main Visitor Center in Mountainair is open daily 8:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. The three park Mission Units (Abo, Quarai, and Gran Quivira)  are open daily with summer hours (Memorial Day - Labor Day) 9:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m., and winter hours (rest of the year) 9:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. Salinas Pueblo Missions is closed three days out of the year: Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day, and New Years Day. The park may also be closed due to inclement weather. Please call ahead to check the status on days of heavy wintry weather.
